// COMMENT: AnyClaude Configuration File - Simplified for LMStudio and OpenRouter only
// USAGE: Copy this to .anyclauderc.json and customize for your setup
// DOCS: See README.md for detailed configuration guide

lmstudio.description: LMStudio - loads whatever model you have running in the UI

openrouter.description: OpenRouter - 400+ cloud models, 88% cheaper than Claude API

claude.description: Real Anthropic Claude API (requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env var)

// BACKEND OPTIONS.lmstudio: Local models - cross-platform, manual server management
// BACKEND OPTIONS.openrouter: Cloud models - access Gemini, Qwen, Claude, GPT-4 via one API (recommended for best quality)
// BACKEND OPTIONS.claude: Official Claude API - full features, highest cost

// POPULAR OPENROUTER MODELS.google/gemini-2.5-flash: $0.30/$2.50 per 1M tokens - 1M context, thinking mode (DEFAULT, best value)
// POPULAR OPENROUTER MODELS.z-ai/glm-4.6: $0.60/$2 per 1M tokens - 200K context, excellent for coding

// ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES.OPENROUTER_API_KEY: Your OpenRouter API key (get from openrouter.ai)
// ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY: Your Anthropic API key (for claude mode)

// QUICK START.LMStudio: 1. Load a model in LMStudio, 2. Set backend: 'lmstudio', 3. Run: anyclaude
// QUICK START.OpenRouter: 1. Get API key from openrouter.ai, 2. Set backend: 'openrouter', 3. Add apiKey, 4. Run: anyclaude

// COST COMPARISON (per 1M tokens).Gemini 2.5 Flash (DEFAULT): $0.30 input / $2.50 output - 88% cheaper than Claude, thinking mode
// COST COMPARISON (per 1M tokens).Qwen 2.5 72B: $0.35 input / $0.70 output - best value for basic coding
